definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
"vertical stroke with hook" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 6)/see also 豎鉤|竖钩[shu4 gou1]
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
Chen Shui-Bian (1950-), Taiwanese DPP 民進黨|民进党 politician, president of the Republic of China 2000-2008
to dive (into water)/(sports) diving/to commit suicide by jumping into water/(fig.) (of stock prices etc) to fall dramatically

sentences.english: While it was a great day, I got a bit sunburned in the water.
sentences.chinese: 今天過得很棒，但我在水裏把自己給曬傷了。

sentences.english: I need some water to quench .
Blend oils and then add to a bowl of steaming water and inhale for five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 混合油，然後添加到一碗熱氣騰騰的水和吸入五分鐘。

sentences.english: What happens when you mix flour with water?
sentences.chinese: 你混合水和麪粉的時候會發生什麼事呢？

sentences.english: The water gurgled as it ran down the plug-hole.
sentences.chinese: 水汨汨地從塞孔中流下去。

sentences.english: Not only can walking fish live out of water but they can also travel short distances over land.
sentences.chinese: 鮎魚不僅可以離開水存活，還可以在岸上短間隔移動。

sentences.english: Desalting of crude oil consumes huge quantity of fresh water.
sentences.chinese: 原油脫鹽要消耗大量的新鮮水。

sentences.english: Don't wear too much perfume or aftershave.
sentences.chinese: 不要使用太多香水或鬚後水。

sentences.english: If women are clean water, the ones who have fallen in love time after time are footbath water.
sentences.chinese: 如果說女人是水，那麼戀愛多次的女人就象洗腳水。

sentences.english: In flush times, the convenience of buying a bottle of water seemed to justify its $1-plus price.
sentences.chinese: 購買了一瓶水的方便似乎證明了其1美元以上的價格。

sentences.english: Winter changes the water of heaven and the heart of man into a stone.
sentences.chinese: 冬季把天上的水和人的心都變成了冰。

sentences.english: In the computation of wave diffraction, thin layer of water is employed to simulate the breakwater.
sentences.chinese: 在計算堤後繞射中，採用了堤上薄膜水的方法。

sentences.english: I find the water in the river very dirty.
I was continually getting up and going to the bathroom to refill my glass.
sentences.chinese: 我頻繁起來去洗手間，把我的玻璃杯灌滿水。

sentences.english: Water is the restrictive factor for sand industry development.
sentences.chinese: 制約沙產業發展的瓶頸因素是水。

sentences.english: Water went down his throat and he started to choke.
sentences.chinese: 水進入他的喉嚨，他開始嗆住了。

definition: Qingshui (place name)/Shimizu (Japanese surname and place name)
upper reaches (of a river)/to go upstream/to add some water/to water (a crop etc)
to skim/lightly touching the water (as the dragonfly in the idiom 蜻蜓點水|蜻蜓点水)/skin-deep
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
